留言內容: The fabric feels very soft and the shirt is well made. The color saturation is great, although there are some bleed throughs in the pattern in a couple of places. The fit is true to size, I wear a 16 and the large fits perfectly. I bought three and may pick up a couple more colors.

商品名稱: 女款上衣 七分袖襯衫 圓領 寬鬆 休閒 襯衫 印花 T 恤
SKU: 尺寸: X-Large顏色: 白藍葉
留言內容: I like the feel of the material, soft and giving but not clingy or shiny. I found the top true to size and fit well around the bust and hips with no stretch or pulling of the fabric. colors are vibrant as well just a quality, well made garment.

商品名稱: 女款上衣 七分袖襯衫 圓領 寬鬆 休閒 襯衫 印花 T 恤

留言內容: Very pretty but it's a little too small even though I ordered the recommended size. Also, the white is not as white as shown.  It seems well made and the fabric is nice.

商品名稱: 女款上衣 七分袖襯衫 圓領 寬鬆 休閒 襯衫 印花 T 恤
SKU: 尺寸: Large顏色: 白藍葉
留言內容: The fit and comfort of this top is great. The colors are just like the picture and it is oh, so comfortable. Can dress up or wear with jeans. I am long waisted and it is a perfect length. I will buy more.

商品名稱: 女款上衣 七分袖襯衫 圓領 寬鬆 休閒 襯衫 印花 T 恤
SKU: 尺寸: XX-Large顏色: 白藍葉
留言內容: True to size. Washes very easy. No wrinkles. Looks nice with jeans and dress pants.

商品名稱: 女款上衣 七分袖襯衫 圓領 寬鬆 休閒 襯衫 印花 T 恤
SKU: 尺寸: X-Large顏色: 白藍葉
留言內容: Nice fabric & color saturation in print. Doesn't stretch out of shape. Full in hips with more fabric across the belly so suitable for ladies w/ a tummy. Warm enough for winter. Too warm for summer as polyester fabric is a tight weave. Giftable! Lovely fancy t-shirt! Easy to dress up or down; shorts, jeans, dress pants!* I needed some alterations: After first wear I realized the neckline is scratchy because of a plastic elastic that was used in the neckline trim. I had to disassemble the neckline trim remove the plastic elastic and redo the neckline. I also made it into a vneck; much cooler. Removed the extra fabric from belly.  Now it's my favorite shirt. This shirt is so cute and the fabric is so soft it was worth the alterations!

商品名稱: 女款上衣 七分袖襯衫 圓領 寬鬆 休閒 襯衫 印花 T 恤
SKU: 尺寸: Medium顏色: 白色
留言內容: Top is nice fitting, comfortable,pretty colors and soft. For me it's a bit too long but that's ok. I would recommend it.

商品名稱: 女款上衣 七分袖襯衫 圓領 寬鬆 休閒 襯衫 印花 T 恤
SKU: 尺寸: Small顏色: 白藍葉
留言內容: Pattern and colors of the watercolor leaf print are very nice, but design is blurry,  like when you enlarge a photo too much. Very long tunic length on my 5’2” height, but don’t mind that. At 118 lbs, top part fits perfectly, but I carry a bit of weight around my middle, and the stomach portion is cut a little tight and narrow. Normally I don’t have that problem with tunics. Might have given it 3.5 stars if I could.

商品名稱: 女款上衣 七分袖襯衫 圓領 寬鬆 休閒 襯衫 印花 T 恤

留言內容: The nice leafy-look blouse/top is just as beautiful as seen in the ad photo. It laundered very nicely.Its only lack is that it is cut like a swimsuit, not an outerwear top. I was very embarrassed to sit down while wearing it.This is not a top for mature women. I suppose it's for those who want to show off their curves. I'm disappointed because it was my birthday gift.
